attributes.action: Not reopen schools until all teaching staff have been vaccinated.
attributes.background: If the government wants schools to open they should ensure the staff are safe first. At present the virus is most prevalent in primary and secondary children, even though schools only have key worker and vulnerable children in school. Vaccinate us first to allow us to feel safe at work.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Don’t re-open schools until all staff have been vaccinated
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572419
